siteMetadata.title: Blog by Srinath Muskula
siteMetadata.subtitle: Engineer, writing about topics related to technology

markdownRemark.html:
Hello, this is my personal blog. I wanted to write about various technological trends, topics I care and spread some of my experience.

I am from Bay Area, California. If you are here and interested to meet, ping me.

I strongly believe by sharing knowledge you will help others and also reinforce your knowledge.

The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven’t found it yet, keep looking. Don’t settle

Thank you for visiting :-)
